com.gwtsystem.server.dao

Interface IGenericDao<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of object persistence
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ICustomerDao, ICustomerTypeDao
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomerDao, CustomerTypeDao, GenericAbstractDao

    public interface IGenericDao<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable>
    Created by alexanderleonovich on 30.07.15.

    Interface for generic CRUD operations on a repository for a specific type.

    See Also:
    GenericAbstractDao

    • Method Summary

        T get(PK id)
      throws DaoException
        Retrieves an entity by its id.
        Parameters:
        id - - must not be null.
        Returns:
        the entity with the given id or null if none found

                         throws DaoException

      • add

        PK add(T object)
                                    throws DaoException
        Persist the given transient instance, first assigning a generated identifier. (Or using the current value of the identifier property if the assigned generator is used.) This operation cascades to associated instances if the association is mapped with cascade="save-update"
        Parameters:
        object - - a transient instance of a persistent class
        Returns:
        the generated identifier
        Throws:
        DaoException

      • update

        void update(T object)
            throws DaoException
        Either save(Object) or update(Object) the given instance, depending upon resolution of the unsaved-value checks. This operation cascades to associated instances if the association is mapped with cascade="save-update"
        Parameters:
        object - - a transient or detached instance containing new or updated state
        Throws:
        DaoException

      • delete

        void delete(T object)
            throws DaoException
        Deletes a given object.
        Parameters:
        object - - must not be null
        Throws:
        DaoException

      • getQuery

                             throws DaoException
        Create a Query instance for the given HQL query string.
        Parameters:
        hql - - The HQL query
        Returns:
        The query instance for manipulation and execution
        Throws:
        DaoException
